description:
Your favorite go-anywhere T-shirt elevated with a premium blend of organic cotton and natural merino wool, the Central Short Sleeve Tee is a reliable everyday staple that’s casual, comfortable and 100% natural. The Central’s fabric is an ethical and cruelty-free blend of natural fibers, fusing the softness of cotton with the natural breathability and odor resistance of merino wool.

The icebreaker 100% natural range is made of fibers that are free from petrochemical-based synthetics and ethically sourced from plants and animals.
name: Icebreaker Central SS Tee - Mens
